short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pick and save your favorite colors with HEX codes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pick colors from any webpage or enter your most used color codes to save for later use. 

Key Features - 

1) Easily pick colors from webpages
2) Enter Hex code of colors
3) Save colors codes
4) Easily copy color coders
5) Easily Delete and Add colors
6) View saved colors in tabular or grid style
